title: Fragment, 1780s
medium:
Linen warp, cotton weft plain weave.
block-printed
description: Polychrome diamond grid formed by flowers and large fruit containing an alternation of two scenes, both titled in French. One scene with a couple and a lamb is titled 'le Mouton Cherie', the other shows boats in a harbor, 'Rade de Cherbourg'. Black, two reds, blue and yellow.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 1780s.
1780s. Linen warp, cotton weft plain weave.
block-printed. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-228.
